name: Circuit Cat
description: Circuit Cat is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With its vibrant orange box and retro console buttons, it brings a sense of nostalgia to the digital world. Its arms and legs are equipped with rocket boosters, allowing it to move swiftly and navigate through any terrain. The screen on its front displays a cute cat animation, adding a touch of whimsy to its appearance. To complete its stylish look, Circuit Cat wears a pair of cool shades, giving it a hip and trendy vibe. With its advanced features and playful personality, Circuit Cat is the perfect companion for any tech enthusiast.
